channel.title: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?
channel.description: I have heard you can run 317 clients with vista 64 bit, using some "Run86" thing. But how do I code the run.bat file, so it can run on Vista 64 bit??? I really want to play servers!

item.title: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

It’s not hard at all, my friend has a 64bit vista and he runs a server just like anyone else.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?

item.title: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Most 317 servers crash after you try to move twice or bank or go to a shop. What I mean by crash is it all just exits out. There are servers like 2speced and Dclaws-Pks and shit that have a client that has a “Run86” or something like that and it doesn’t crash on vista 64bit.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?

item.title: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?
item.dc:creator: @Treber Treber
item.description:
@Treber wrote:

I have no idea what you’re talking about. Is there some kind of error showing up in the command box when you run a 317 client or server? I’m pretty sure that you can run any command prompt on a 64 bit (correct me if I’m wrong).

Just post an image of whats the problem or be more specific.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I run 317's with Vista 64 bit?
